name: Ossmium
description:
Ossmium is a Ukraine based design company. We are a small but passionate team of high skilled UI/UX specialists. Our main specialization are user interfaces of any difficulties. 
A Family approach to your graphic design project You can find lots of graphic design teams around. Many of them are really great in what they do. But have you ever experienced working with more than a team of designers but with a loving couple that has a special flair and passion for graphic design? We are the ones who will implement your web and mobile design project with as much care and thoughtfulness as a family offers to their child. 
READ MORE...
